channel.title: music on Matt Mayes from Chicago, IL
channel.description: Recent content in music on Matt Mayes from Chicago, IL

item.title: Ether Frolics
item.description: I joined this band after responding to their add in the Chicago Reader, looking for a drummer. I was pretty much a kid out of school, and these guys really showed me around the whole Chicago scene. We played about every club/bar/venue in the area, and eventually headed over to Europe for a 3 week tour after our first album was released (40k - with the red cover). While working on our second album, the band got derailed a bit, and we never got to the final polishing/release stages.

item.title: Jazz Conspiracy
item.description: Jazz Conspiracy was born out of the Bloom School of Jazz - where many of us met, studied, practiced - and eventually performed at the Jazz Showcase. We were an actively gigging/recording band from about 2003-2010 or so, being regularly featured for entire weekends at Pops for Champagne. Below are some of my favorite tracks - you can listen to all of them for free over at SoundCloud . The Musicians David Beazley(piano) Marc Piane (acoustic bass) Matt Mayes (drums) Thomas Mucha (trumpet) Trent Harris (saxphones)
